reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and appreciate its oversized fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cardigan
items.body: This is an awesome cardigan. Soft and cozy. Perfect fit. Read more
items.author: Clara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The softest!
items.body: So soft and comfortable! Read more
items.author: Jennifer Roberson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars runs large
items.body: The fuzzy mohair cardigan from Flygo runs really large. The size small on my 5'6", 128-pound frame feels like a large. The 100% nylon garment is wonderfully soft. It only has three buttons, which do not seem like enough. If you button all three buttons and pull the sweater up a bit, it gaps horribly between the 2nd and 3rd buttons. This garment feels like it needs the correct styling to avoid looking like an oversized mess. The tag says to wash at a low temperature and hang to dry. I will machine wash on the delicate cycle and lay flat to dry, as I think it will get misshapen if hung wet. Read more
items.author: T JoJo

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, oversized
items.body: Love the fuzzy texture, the color is beautiful and on trend. I ordered a small but it feels really oversized to me. Only has 3 buttons, I think it could use a few more. I will be wearing it but would not buy it again. Read more
items.author: kevin riley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it: soft and cozy
items.body: Sweater received so many compliments. I’m usually a medium, small fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: MikMik

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love
items.body: When you first receive this cardigan, don’t let the packaging fool you! It comes vacuum sealed and when you open it, the fuzzy material is flat, but once shaken and aired, it fluffs right up! The fit on this runs a bit big, so I would order down a size. The material is soft and a little bit on the thicker side. I love the neutral color, making it easy to style with just about anything. Read more
items.author: Joshua

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars dont buy this sweater
items.body: This sweater is nothing like it shows it actually looks like a cheap sweater horrible Read more
items.author: teresa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly Soft and Cozy
items.body: This sweater is incredibly soft and cozy! It's such a soft fabric that I want to sleep/lounge in it all day! It has a nice enough look that I feel like I could pair it with a skirt or over a dress and wear it out to a nice dinner or for a dressier occasion. In terms of sizing, I can fluctuate between a small and a medium in tops and sweaters. I ordered this in a medium and am happy with the fit. I probably could have gotten away with a small for a more fitted look, but I tend to like more room than less in sweaters and cardigans. The color is really pretty. It's maybe slightly more saturated than what is shown in the product images, but not in an offensive way. I think this is a gorgeous find and fairly priced too! Read more
items.author: Megan | Closet Full of Chaos

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Pink, White, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
